title: Lakshmi Kasula Haaram - Modern Grandeur with Timeless Tradition
materials: Emerald. Features a brilliant Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: The necklace showcases a contemporary interpretation of the classic Kasula Haaram design. Exquisite craftsmanship featuring Chevron gold patterns pave set with Cubic Zirconia, embellished with delicate drops. The central pendant displays a traditional deity Lakshmi motif framed with Ruby and Emerald gemstones. Intricate filigree work around the setting elevates the elegance of the piece.
colors: Rich Green (Emerald). A vibrant yet elegant color palette perfect for traditional occasions.
occasions: Perfect for Bridal Wear ( పెళ్లి నగల)
or any grand celebration where you want to make a statement.
description: This Kasula Haaram is a testament to exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of traditional elements with modern aesthetics makes it a versatile piece suitable for both classic and contemporary wardrobes. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine, making it a cherished heirloom for generations to come.
